conbody.p: Creating automation test cases is a repetitive task that requires a lot of editing and re-running test cases. In many automation tools, when a test case fails and you make certain changes to the script, you usually have to execute the whole script all over again to make sure the test is executed as expected.
To save your precious time from tedious repetitive re-running all unnecessary steps for debugging and to make debugging easier, provides the following utilities:

ul.li: An active Katalon Studio Enterprise license.
